tuv.seg: The Schools Inspectorate, a branch of the Department of Education and Skills, is responsible for inspecting and evaluating all State schools
Tá Foireann Chigireachta na Scoileanna, mar chuid den Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna, freagrach as cigireacht agus measúnú a dhéanamh ar na scoileanna Stáit go léir
Provides information on a teacher's duty of care, accidents in the school, and the school's requirement to have insurance
Eolas maidir le dualgas cúram mhúinteoirí, timpistí sa scoil, agus freagracht na scoile maidir le hárachas
Educational initiatives which award flags to schools that successfully participate in their programmes
Tionscnaimh oideachais a bhronnann bratacha ar scoileanna a ghlacann páirt rathúil ina gcuid clár
Information about the education, professional qualifications and registration of teachers in primary and post primary schools
Faisnéis faoi na cáilíochtaí oideachais, gairmiúla agus clárú múinteoirí i mbunscoileanna agus in iar-bhunscoileanna
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Oideachas agus Oiliúint"
School terms in primary and post-primary schools
Téarmaí scoile i mbunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna
